name: HorrificWar
description:
A game made in a week for Prototype Studio class, at that class, we have a prompt from Bennett Foddy every week, and we are asked to make a game within a week with that prompt. And that week's prompt is Good Luck! So I made the HorrificWar.

You are supposed to survive in a warfare. You will consume one chicken every day. Some people in the warfare will just give you beers, cigarettes or chicken. Some want to trade with you. Some people want you to kill other people, and some will just kill you. Be caution in the warfare. And be alive.
